notes_translated.fr: Information concernant l'émission non contrôlée d'agents chimiques ou biologiques, la contamination radioactive de l'environnement ou les explosions qui causent des dommages très étendus.
notes_translated.en: Information regarding the uncontrolled release of chemicals, biological agents or radioactive contamination into the environment or explosions that cause widespread damage; and Health Canada's role in preparation for, or in the event of such an emergency.
